examplePhrases: Alexa ask text adventure where am I?
en-US.name: Text Adventure
en-US.description:
In this game you navigate the rooms and avoid the perils to survive until the end.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Text Adventure" or "Alexa, open Text Adventure" to start a game".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
